#include <cstdio>
int a[200][200];
int m, n;
int max( int i, int j ) {
	if( i-1 < 0 ) {
		return a[i][j];
	}
	int ret = a[i-1][j];
	if( j - 1 >= 0 ) {
		ret = ret > a[i-1][j-1] ? ret : a[i-1][j-1];
	}
	if( j + 1 < n ) {
		ret = ret > a[i-1][j+1] ? ret : a[i-1][j+1];
	}
	return a[i][j] + ret;

}

int main() {
	int t, i, j;
	scanf( "%d", &t );
	while( t-- ) {
		scanf( "%d%d", &m, &n );
		for( i=0;i<m;i++ ) {
			for( j=0;j<n;j++ ) {
				scanf( "%d", &a[i][j] );
				a[i][j] = max( i, j );
			}
		}
		int res = -1;
		for( i=0;i<n;i++ ) {
			if( a[m-1][i] > res ) {
				res = a[m-1][i];
			}
		}
		printf( "%d\n", res );
	}
	return 0;
}
